title: Bug 118780: Incorrect Display of Column Aliases in Expression Builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: In the expression builder, the columns of the dataset show their original names instead of the set aliases when selecting the dataset.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases set for columns in the dataset when selecting it.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Verify that the expression builder displays the alias 'column1' when selecting the dataset.
